level.heading: Subchapter not exclusive.
level.text: This subchapter shall not prohibit a limited cooperative association from being merged under law other than this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 1612 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
